content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61) dropping to position (-27.5, -59.5)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25, -59)
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)
- Output chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron plates and copper plates

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at (-18, -53)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18, -53) dropping to position (-17.5, -51.5)
- Wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15, -51)
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)
- Output chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

### Coal Mining Setup at (41, -82)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41, -82) dropping to position (41.5, -80.5)
- Wooden chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups carrying water

### Automation Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5) containing copper plates
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Connected by belt groups for material transport

# ERROR TIPS

### Power System Issues
- Ensure boiler has constant fuel supply to maintain power generation
- Steam engine not receiving electricity and fluid - verify pipe connections and fuel supply

### Automation Science Pack Production Issues
- Cannot extract science packs because they are not being produced - verify assembling machine has power and required ingredients
- Assembling machine lacks power - check electrical connections
- Some inserters waiting for space in destination - ensure output paths are clear

### Mining System Issues
- Some mining drills need coal fuel to operate
- Some inserters waiting for source items - ensure proper material flow

### General Tips
- Verify fuel supply in all burner-powered entities
- Check electrical connections for powered machines
- Ensure proper input/output connections between entities
- Clear blocked outputs to prevent production stalls
- Monitor and maintain coal supply for burner entities
